Build ID: 20110615151330

Steps to reproduce:

I open new messages NOT in a new window, BUT in Thunderbird's message pane.
(see http://kb.mozillazine.org/Window_layout_-_Thunderbird#Layouts for a explanation of the different panes)


Actual results:

When I click REPLY/FORWARD in the message pane, a new compose window opens.


Expected results:

Instead of opening a new window, I also would like to compose my reply/forward message directly in Thunderbird's message pane.
